content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Big Signet, from Dragnet this week. That story originally aired July 31, 1952.

(30:10) The Fat Man serves up our second story with his episode from May 23, 1951, Order For Murder.

Download CaseClosed721

It’s no mystery who makes this podcast possible. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
